column4: Anyone have a minute to help me finish with a problem I'm having? I believe bazhang had to go AFK for a bit. We've established that my wireless card can connect to the router, but I can't seem to go anywhere when I unplug the ethernet cable! :(
hey, what point are you at? unplugged just wifi'ing?
unfortunately still plugged into the ethernet cable, I have no wifi, yet it reads the DHCP and my router even recognized it
and I'm a total Linux noob, so I'm not quite sure what I'm doing if I attempt to fix this :S
ok, so you can connect to your router? dont worry,. we were all new once (well most of us)
you mean the config page? With the laptop plugged in I'm sure I can :)
ok, so when you switch to wiifi (not eth) can you ping any site?
the IP for a linksys wireless router is 192.168.1.1 correct? O_O I can't connect to it :(
No I can't.
ok, so you cant! connect to your router -- whats the output of          iwconfig
do you just want to know one part of that, or want me to pastebin it?
pastebin please
http://paste.ubuntu.com/12053/
ok, (i have to leave soon) but your wireless is set up but not making a connection, open network manager and check the third tab 'dns'make sure you have the routers address in their
Ok I added it, should I test it out?
yeah
alright, be right back
Didn't work :(
im afraid i have to leave now,.,. keep asking the channel and wait till bazhang gets back -- sorry
No problem, thanks for your help
;~) bye
